file_content.text: Notice to all personnel: Warning! Unscheduled main generator shutdown sequence initiated. Repeat: Main generator shutdown sequence initiated.
Main generator functionality will cease unless shutdown sequence is aborted before completion.
Warning: Main generator reactivation requires three-week overhaul, to be carried out by trained Imperial Power Bureau officials only.
If main generator shutdown sequence has been initiated in error, proceed immediately to Generator Command to abort the sequence.
Uh-oh. Guess we can expect a lot of company heading our way.
All personnel in the facility will have heard that command, Lieutenant. We should anticipate heavy reinforcements.
Nobody listens to those things, Sergeant.
Don't be paranoid.
Might want to rethink that, sir.
I can tell you firsthand, sir: Reinforcements will come.
Yeah, I gathered that.
Here they come!
Incoming!
Excellent! Every Imperial in the facility will respond to that alarm--we can make our stand here, and slaughter them all in one glorious stroke!
Havoc Squad--stand to!
Defensive positions!
Nobody listens to those things, Forex.
I wouldn't bet on it.
Bring 'em on.
Targets identified! Initiating slaughter protocols!
That is all.
Notice to all personnel: Main generator shutdown sequence completed successfully! All generator function has been terminated.
That is all.
